Sentencas: Micro-solid oxide fuel cell (mu SOFC) structures with annular Pt electrodes have been fabricated by means of silicon micromachining.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The annular cathodes contained a defined triple phase boundary (TPB) length, which allowed the derivation of the ionic current per length of TPB as 1.24 mA m(-1), measured at 450 degrees C at maximal power.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Considering literature values for oxygen diffusion activation on Pt, the active zone supplying atomic oxygen to the triple phase boundary was calculated to be 22 nm wide at most.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The anode function was provided by a CGO layer, known to be electrically conductive at reducing conditions, with annular Pt current collector.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The TPB length was increased by adding a Pt-YSZ composite cathode layer covering the complete YSZ/CGO membrane.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The peak power density was increased by a factor of 5 to reach 5 mW cm(-2) with an open circuit voltage of 0.68V at 450 degrees C.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was observed that the Pt grains re-crystallized to large grains, leading to a loss of electrical connectivity in the composite layer.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite cathode layer was thus inadequate to contact the complete membrane area, leading to a too large area specific resistance (ASR) in the interior of the cell.
Titulo: Experimental study of single triple-phase-boundary and platinum-yttria stabilized zirconia composite as cathodes for micro-solid oxide fuel cells
